meanings.sent1: At the science fair, the nonbiologists were fascinated by the chemistry experiments.
meanings.sent2: The nonbiologists enjoyed learning about different scientific fields.
meanings.sent3: The nonbiologists tried to identify the plants in the garden but ended up confusing a rose with a daisy.
meanings.sent4: In a world of biologists, the nonbiologists were like fish out of water.
meanings.sent5: The group of nonbiologists stood out in the biology class with their unique questions.

meanings.definition: Those who do not study biology.
meanings.sent1: The nonbiologists preferred physics over biology in school.
meanings.sent2: Many nonbiologists find astronomy more intriguing than biology.
meanings.sent3: During the nature hike, the nonbiologists joked about being lost in the world of biology.
meanings.sent4: To the nonbiologists, biology textbooks were as confusing as ancient hieroglyphics.
meanings.sent5: The nonbiologists explored the forest, appreciating nature without delving into biology.
